description.value:
You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Lie]{Lie} about having taken an action so convincingly that you acquire all the tangible benefits of having successfully completed it.

You can roll Deception in place of a different skill when attempting to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Earn Income]{Earn Income}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Make an Impression]{Make an Impression}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Request]{Request}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Subsist]{Subsist}.

You can use Fabricated Connections to Make an Impression or Request once per day, and you can also use it once per week to Earn Income or Subsist.
